trans-unit.source: Creates the theme-specific look for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> elements. A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> defines the appearance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 创建主题特定于的外观[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] <> </> *1> 元素。A <> </> *1> 定义的外观<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The actual appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 实际外观<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>依赖于用户的系统上的活动的主题。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this class allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to set the appearance based on the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 此类的属性允许[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]来设置基于当前主题的外观。

trans-unit.source: In XAML usage, a BulletChrome object element can also have child content, which can be a single <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 用法 BulletChrome 对象元素还可以具有子内容，它可以是单个<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 对象元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值`theme:`为 xmlns 前缀CLR 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，xmlns 前缀和映射 （未显示） 的 XAML 根元素中定义。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.BulletChrome"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>已选中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*>

trans-unit.source: This property only applies when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the object used for the bullet supports an `IsThreeState` property, and the value of that property is `true`, then a value of `null` is potentially user-settable.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于项目符号的对象支持`IsThreeState`属性，且该属性的值是`true`，然后值`null`由潜在用户设置。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value of IsChecked cannot be set to `null` by user action, but it can be set that way in markup or code.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不能 IsChecked 的值设置为`null`由用户操作，但它可以设置在标记或代码中的这种方式。
